description: Reading maintain their excellent home form with a hard-earned victory over fellow League One play-off chasers Mansfield Town.
title: Reading 2-1 Mansfield Town
title_page: League One: Reading 2-1 Mansfield Town - BBC Sport
maintext:
This will be the first league game between Reading and Mansfield Town since April 1993, a match during which the Royals won 3-1 on home soil.
Mansfield Town have failed to win any of their 24 away league games against Reading (D4 L20), netting just three goals in total across their last 12 such matches.
Five of Readingâ€™s last seven final league games of a calendar year have ended in draws (W1 L1), including each of their last two.
